headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hunting Camo Livery for Rank 100 and Above Players
content:
In acknowledgement of those who go above and beyond to reach greatness, all players Rank 100 and above will receive the rare Hunting Camo livery with which to wrap up their Mammoth Avenger – for free (available within 72 hours of logging in after June 7th).

Plus, light up the sky, or an unsuspecting populace – pick up a Firework Launcher and its ammunition in the off-season, free of charge until June 2nd.
